critique: This document is an executive order establishing the line of succession for various positions within the Department of Defense. It is primarily concerned with ensuring continuity of operations in the event of a disaster. There is no indication of ideological bias, immigration policy, or social inclusion. The order does expand executive power to some extent, as it is a presidential directive. It centralizes authority within the federal government, specifically the Department of Defense. It also touches on national security by ensuring continuity of leadership. There is no economic regulation involved.
